name: airline_agent
description: An agent specialized in handling flight bookings and airline reservations. Provides comprehensive flight search, booking, and cancellation services.

skills.name: Flight Search
skills.description: Search for available flights based on origin, destination, dates, and preferences

skills.name: Flight Booking
skills.description: Book flights and manage airline reservations

skills.name: Booking Cancellation
skills.description: Cancel existing flight bookings and process refunds
